name: Air Hockey VR for Oculus Quest
name_original: Air Hockey VR for Oculus Quest
description:
Play Air Hockey in Oculus Quest!

This game features a bot that is capable of reacting accordingly to different situations depending on the puck's movement and position. The difficulty of this bot can be scaled up or down if the need to do so arose.

Controls:

-Grip: Grab your striker.

-Joystick (Horizontal): Scroll through the different customizable speed modifiers.

-Joystick (Vertical): Adjust the currently selected speed modifier.

-A/X: Pause the game.

-B/Y: Reset the game.
